editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Missal, መጽሐፈ፡ ቅዳሴ፡. Ff. 1-44v: Ordinary of the Mass. In a gold case, with a plaque on the front that says, ንጉሠ ነ[ገሥት] ኃይለ ሥላሴ. F-62r: Anaphora of the Apostles, Qǝddase Ḫawaryat, ቅዳሴ፡ ሐዋርያት፡. F-68r: Anaphora of Our Lord, ቅዳሴ፡ እግዚእ፡. See Mercer. F-79v: Anaphora of John, Son of Thunder, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡. F-93r: Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bəhənsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡. F-103v: Anaphora of the 318 Orthodox Fathers, Qǝddase za-Śäläsǝtu, ቅዳሴ፡ ዘሠለስቱ፡ ምዕት፡. F-116r: Anaphora of Athanasius the Apostolic, Qǝddase Atǝnatewos, ቅዳሴ፡ አትናቴዎስ፡. F-126v: Anaphora of Basil of Caesarea, Qǝddase Baslǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ባስልዮስ፡. F-135v: Anaphora of Gregory, brother of Basil, Qǝddase Gorǝgorǝyos, ‘Ǝḫǝwä Baslǝyos., ቅዳሴ፡ ጎርጎርዮስ፡ እኅወ፡ ባስልዮስ፡. F-144r: Anaphora of Epiphanius, Qǝddase Epifanǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ኤጲፋንዮስ. F-152r: Anaphora of John Chrysostom, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Afä Wärq, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈወርቅ፡. F-160v: Anaphora of Cyril of Alexandria, Qǝddase Qerǝlos, ቅዳሴ፡ ቄርሎስ፡. F-169r: Anaphora of Jacob of Serugh, Qǝddase Ya’ǝkob Zä-Śǝrug, ቅዳሴ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘሥሩግ፡. F-176r: Anaphora of Dioscorus, Qǝddase Diosǝqoros, ቅዳሴ፡ ዲዮስቆሮስ፡. F-182r: Anaphora of Gregory Nazanzia, ጎርጎርዮስ: ዘእንዚናዙ:, here called "the second Gregory." Sometimes called Anaphora of Gregory of Armenia, the Wonder Worker, ጎርጎርዮስ፡ ዘአርማንያ፡. Notes. (and passim) mentions Abba ዮሐንስ (XIX, 192801942) and Abba ቄርሎስ (VI, 1929-1950). (and passim) mentions "our King," ኃይለ ሥላሴ (1930-1974). : a concluding note that indicates that "If a priest or a deacon does not participate in the midnight mass, they cannot participate in Holy Communion. If they break this rule, they will be out of order." : Colophon: This book was produced by the order of Haile Selassie in 1922 EC in the time of Qerelos (VI). A list of the Echegge and five regional bishops is also given. The head of the Ministry of Pen (ጸሐፌ ትእዛዝ) is ወልደ መስቀል. The scribe is የሽዋ ወርቅ. : a secondary note of memorial to ንቡረ እድ ገብረ መስቀል.
